text: Cheap is an EP by Swedish rock band Brainbombs. It was released through Load Records through vinyl. Load also released a limited edition clear red vinyl of the EP aswell. The EP has a remix of "It's a Burning Hell" off the album "Burning Hell". The remix was made by German DJ, Alec Empire and recorded in 2000 but was not released until the LP was released. The remix had mixed reviews, the band has also said they were not happy with the remix. == Track listing == == References == Category:Rock albums Category:Brainbombs albums Category:2003 albums
title: Cheap (Brainbombs EP)
